labels.text: Before you change your number, here are a few things to note:
• Once you change your phone number you won’t be able to go back to your old number.
• You might lose saved voicemails when your phone number is changed.
• You may not be able to place or receive calls or texts until your new phone number request has been completed.
Remember that a  number change can take up to 15 minutes to complete. Still having trouble? Update your profile.
